info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:58PM EDT until September 07 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BROOME AND NORTH CENTRAL SUSQUEHANNA COUNTIES... At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brackney, or 8 miles south of Binghamton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement has reported tree damage in areas south and southeast of Binghamton. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Johnson City, Kirkwood, Conklin, Susquehanna Depot, Port Dickinson, Hallstead, Windsor, Great Bend, and Lanesboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
